mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prod_no , prod_name , prod_detail , manufacture_day , price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES ( seq_product_prod_no.nextval, #{prodName}, #{prodDetail:VARCHAR}, #{manuDate:VARCHAR}, #{price:NUMERIC}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no , p.prod_name , p.prod_detail , p.manufacture_day , p.price , p.image_file , p.reg_date, NVL(t.tran_status_code, '0') AS tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+) AND p.prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.image_file, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.reg_date, NVL(t.tran_status_code, '0') AS tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_name LIKE '%'||#{object.searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.price LIKE '%'||#{object.searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY p.price DESC
ORDER BY p.price ASC
ORDER BY p.prod_no
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{object.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{object.startRowNum} AND #{object.endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.image_file, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.reg_date, NVL(t.tran_status_code, '0') AS tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.price LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY p.prod_name
ORDER BY p.price
) countTable
